doc.title: Glendale Fire Department Safety House
doc.plot: The Glendale Fire Department Safety House Trailer was purchased with a FEMA Grant and provides realistic training for youth and adults on escape tactics from burning structures. Dennis Davis a volunteer for the Glendale Fire Department and class teacher, travels around the city to schools and adult centers introducing and refreshing people on the wisdom of fire safety. This unique training aid is often on display at Glendale city events also. "GET OUT - STAY OUT" is the message... learn it well it will save your life!
